title: Bella Mooca Pizzaria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizza parlor offering different types of cheese, including ones made in-house. Many vegetarian and vegan choices. Simple decor with few chairs. Also sells frozen and ready-to-eat vegan snacks.
streetAddress: Rua Dr Joao Batista de Lacerda, 96
